GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles - default order set: descending by date of creation

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of article with queried ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments from specified article_id - default order set: most recent comment first

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a comment under the specified Id - return comment object

exampleInput.body: I haven't posted in a while!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Patches the article votes under the specified ID - return article object with updated votes value

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes comment with specified ID - return 204 if sucessfully deleted

GET /api/users.description: Provides an array of all users and returns a 200 status code
